marklogic.body:
I's 22 weeks pregnant now (second pregnancy). I wasn't vegan when I was pregnant with my now 8 year old, but I totally went Off all meat then.
In my first trimester with this pregnancy, pretty much all I could eat was fruit. There's really not much you can do except to go with the flow and trust that your body knows what it needs and wants. Especially considering that any time I did force myself to eat anything else (something other than what I really felt like), I was violently ill.
I had Morning sickness through both pregnancies, so I'm really not sure it's related to only having veg
